The yellow GEAP application for Regional Gifted Centers, Classical Schools, Academic Centers, and IB Prep Programs cannot be downloaded from the Internet. This application, along with the white standard application, can be found in the Options for Knowledge guide. For a copy, call 773-553-2105.
